1) Needs to be downloaded at: 

https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn-download-survey

2) Download cudnn from Nvidia website:

3) Installation scripts look like:
sudo dpkg -r libcudnn7_7.6.5.32-1+cuda10.2_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -r libcudnn7-dev_7.6.5.32-1+cuda10.2_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7_7.6.5.32-1+cuda10.2_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7-dev_7.6.5.32-1+cuda10.2_amd64.deb
sudo ldconfig
